These change might cause change dietary habit , especially increased intake liquid sugar increase meal frequency . The investigator hypothesize increase meal frequency compare increase meal size consume hypercaloric high-sugar diet ( HS ) compare hypercaloric high-fat-high-sugar diet ( HFHS ) result reduction cerebral serotonin dopamine transporter prominent increase insulin resistance . DOC.detailed_description: Lean , healthy , young men follow hypercaloric HF- HFHS diet 6 week . Before dietary intervention , investigator perform SPECT-scan serotonin dopamine transporter radioligand [ 123I ] FP-CIT , administer intravenously . The investigator also perform structural MRI localization . Furthermore investigator perform liver MRS abdominal MRI liver fat- abdominal visceral fat measurement . The investigator also perform euglycemic , hyperinsulinemic clamp measure insulin sensitivity muscle- fat biopsy examine change insulin signal pathway fat metabolism . After hypercaloric diet subject follow hypocaloric diet weight back baseline .
DOC.criteria: BMI 1926 kg/m2 Age 1840 year old Male gender Caucasian Stable weight 3 month prior start study participation Abnormal oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) Lipid disorder , renal disorder , thyroid disorder , elevate liver enzymes Use medication Use alcohol > 3/day Use ecstasy , amphetamine cocaine Smoking History eat disorder psychiatric disorder Any medical condition , intensive sport ( > 3 times/week ) , shift work
